mapper.select: select * from table_header where second_name = #{tableName} order by id
select * from sum_select_list where rice_type = "one" and in_use = 1
select * from sum_select_list where caption = "县（市、区）" and rice_type = "one" and in_use = 1
select * from sum_select_list where caption = "县（市、区）" and rice_type = "double" and in_use = 1
update crop_01_01_table_01_02 set in_use = 2 where county = #{recordCounty} and modification_time like "%"#{year}"%"
update crop_01_02_table_01_02 set in_use = 2 where county = #{recordCounty} and modification_time like "%"#{year}"%"
update ${returnTableName} set in_use = 2 where id = #{recordId}

insert into table_record_back(record_table,record_county,record_id,reason,back_time,record_people,in_use) values(#{returnTableName},#{recordCounty},#{recordId},#{recordReason},#{recordTime},#{recordPeople},0)
update crop_01_01_table_01_02 set in_use = 3 where county = #{recordCounty} and modification_time like "%"#{year}"%"
update crop_01_02_table_01_02 set in_use = 3 where county = #{recordCounty} and modification_time like "%"#{year}"%"
update ${returnTableName} set in_use = 3 where id = #{recordId}
select * from crop_01_01_table_02_01 where in_use=1 and modification_time like "%"#{year}"%" order by field_5 desc
select * from crop_01_01_table_02_01 where in_use in (1,2,3,4) and field_4 =#{county} and field_1 like "%"#{county}"%" group by field_1
mapper.update: update crop_01_01_table_02_02 set field_2_1=#{field_3},field_2_2=#{field_4},field_2_3=#{field_5},field_2_4=#{field_6},field_2_5=#{field_7},field_3_1=#{field_8}, field_3_2=#{field_9},field_3_3=#{field_10},field_3_4=#{field_11},field_3_5=#{field_12},field_3_6=#{field_13},field_3_7=#{field_14},field_3_8=#{field_15},field_3_9=#{field_16},field_3_10=#{field_17}, field_4_1=#{field_18},field_4_2=#{field_19},field_4_3=#{field_20},field_5_1=#{field_21},field_5_2=#{field_22},field_5_3=#{field_23},field_5_4=#{field_24},field_5_5=#{field_25},field_5_6=#{field_26}, field_5_7=#{field_27},field_5_8=#{field_28},field_5_9=#{field_29},field_5_10=#{field_30},field_5_11=#{field_31},field_5_12=#{field_32},modification_time=#{modification_time}, people=#{people},in_use=3 where field_1=#{field_1} and modification_time like CONCAT(left(#{modification_time},4),'%')
mapper.select: select * from crop_01_01_table_01_01 where in_use=1 and modification_time like "%"#{year}"%"
select * from crop_01_01_table_01_01 where in_use=1 and modification_time like "%"#{time}"%" and field_1 like "%"#{params1}"%"

select * from crop_01_01_table_01_02 where in_use=3
and county = #{county}
and modification_time like "%"#{year}"%"
order by county
select * from crop_01_01_table_01_02 where id in (select min(id) from crop_01_01_table_01_02 where in_use=1 and modification_time like "%"#{year}"%" group by county)

select * from crop_01_01_table_01_02 where id in (select min(id) from crop_01_01_table_01_02 where in_use=1 and modification_time like "%"#{year}"%" group by county)
and county like "%"#{params1}"%"

select * from table_audit order by time desc

select * from table_audit where 1=1
and county like "%"#{params1}"%"
order by time desc

select * from table_audit where 1=1
and county like "%"#{params1}"%"
order by time,id
limit #{start},#{size}
mapper.delete: delete from table_audit where id not in (select t.min_id from (select min(id) as min_id from table_audit group by county,table_name,record_id,time) as t)
delete from table_audit where id=#{rowId} and table_name=#{rowName} and time=#{rowTime}
mapper.select: select * from sum_select_list where caption="县（市、区）" and rice_type="one" and in_use=1

select record_table,record_county,record_id,reason,back_time,record_people,table_record_back.in_use, second_name from table_record_back,table_second_name where table_record_back.in_use = 0 and table_second_name.second_name_id = table_record_back.record_table
and table_record_back.back_time like "%"#{year}"%"

select record_table,record_county,record_id,reason,back_time,record_people,table_record_back.in_use, second_name from table_record_back,table_second_name where table_record_back.in_use = 0 and table_second_name.second_name_id = table_record_back.record_table
and table_second_name.second_name like "%"#{params1}"%"
and table_record_back.record_county like "%"#{params2}"%"
and table_record_back.back_time like "%"#{year}"%"
limit #{start},#{size}

select record_table,record_county,record_id,reason,back_time,record_people,table_record_back.in_use, second_name from table_record_back,table_second_name where table_record_back.in_use = 0 and table_second_name.second_name_id = table_record_back.record_table
and table_second_name.second_name like "%"#{params1}"%"
and table_record_back.record_county like "%"#{params2}"%"
and table_record_back.back_time like "%"#{year}"%"
